name: Megalith (SalamiChild)
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 36, as part of the 72 hour jam.

Aim to complete your megalith in the smallest amount of time, by managing your villagers, and overcoming random events.

(It's a little buggy right now. If any crash the game, let me know so I can fix them~)

--Controls--

It's all mouse driven! Click to assign villagers to jobs and to read notifications.
